summary: An 83 year-old man returns to Germany for a long planned journey of atonement. When Ross, his useless son agrees to drive him there, a nightmare family road trip ensues.
cast: Shane Taylor|Benjamin Whitrow|Eileen Nicholas|Ulrike Arndt|Michael Asmussen|Emil Austermann|Waltraud Bredfeldt|Helge Ihnen|Martina Janßen|Sara Kessel|Günter Mües|Sheela Patel|Herbert Schröder|Volkmar Siems|Dörte Tien
title: Bomber
